results.question: How many offices does Nortal have worldwide?

results.answer: Nortal was founded 25 years ago in Estonia.

results.question: Which company did Nortal acquire in 2024?

results.answer: The name of the data exchange layer Estonia uses is X-Road.

results.question: In what year did Nortal establish a delivery centre in Serbia?
results.answer: Nortal established a delivery centre in Serbia in 2006.
